key_risk_themes: ["Microservice & Distributed System Complexity","Infrastructure & DevOps Readiness","Data Integrity & Compliance"]
immediate_actions_required: ["Prioritize and resource the foundational infrastructure workstream (EPIC-009) to prevent project-wide delays.","Mandate the implementation of resilience patterns (Circuit Breakers, Timeouts) for all inter-service communication from the start.","Conduct a detailed design review of the GDPR data purge SAGA pattern (WI-016) to ensure compliance and data integrity."]
